p: MS data acquisition was performed in negative (ESI–) ionization mode, in the full scan mass range of m/ z 115.0–1000.0, using a resolution of 30,000. The capillary temperature was set at 350 °C. The tuning of capillary voltage and tube lens was at −30 and −100 V, respectively. The source voltage was set at 2.70 kV (ESI–), while source current was 100 μA.
